## ConfirmationDialogComponent class

Bootstrap modal confirmation dialog component

```typescript
export declare class ConfirmationDialogComponent 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_confirmButtonType](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent._confirmbuttontype.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Button type: default, primary, success, info, warning, danger, link |
|  [canceled](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.canceled.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;any&gt;</code> | Occurs when user canceled confirmation |
|  [confirmationText](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.confirmationtext.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Text of confirmation dialog, allows html elements in text |
|  [confirmationTitle](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.confirmationtitle.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Text that is displayed as title of confirmation |
|  [confirmed](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.confirmed.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;any&gt;</code> | Occurs when user confirmed dialog |

|  [dialogConfirmText](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.dialogconfirmtext.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Text for confirm button |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [setFocus(confirmFocus)](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.setfocus.md) |  | Sets focus to one of buttons, if passed parameter is true then confirm button focus is set, otherwise cancelation button is set focus |
|  [showConfirmation(data)](./bootstrap-core.confirmationdialogcomponent.showconfirmation.md) |  | Shows confirmation dialog and stores data that are passed to confirmed event |
